browser-action.name: Capture Web Vitals
browser-action.description:
Captures Core Web Vitals metrics during Virtual User navigation. This helps detect performance issues that affect the user experience.
NeoLoad collects the following metrics for each defined URL:
- Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) - Interaction to Next Paint (INP) - Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
If you don't define a URL, NeoLoad aggregates metrics across all visited pages.
To collect all metrics, place this action before the first Navigate action. The Virtual User needs to stay a minimum amount of time and perform at least one interaction to ensure Web Vitals were collected for a given page. Possible parameters are: - url (optional): A url (excluding query parameters) to group Web Vitals metrics data under.
